pickerInput examples

Source: vignettes/articles/picker-input.Rmd
picker-input.Rmd
library(shinyWidgets)

pickerInput is an alternative to classic shiny selectInput, it comes with a lot of options to customize it. It’s powered by the JavaScript library bootstrap-select.

Basic example

pickerInput(
  inputId = "id",
  label = "Pick a month:",
  choices = month.name
)

Add select / deselect all buttons

pickerInput(
  inputId = "id",
  label = "Pick a month:",
  choices = month.name,
  multiple = TRUE,
  options = pickerOptions(
    actionsBox = TRUE
  )
)

You can customize labels of the buttons :

pickerInput(
  inputId = "id",
  label = "Pick a month:",
  choices = month.name,
  multiple = TRUE,
  options = pickerOptions(
    actionsBox = TRUE,
    selectAllText = "All months",
    deselectAllText = "None",
    noneSelectedText = "Please select a month"
  )
)

Search bar

pickerInput(
  inputId = "id",
  label = "Pick a month:",
  choices = month.name,
  multiple = TRUE,
  options = pickerOptions(
    liveSearch = TRUE,
    liveSearchPlaceholder = "Type something!"
  )
)

You can set tokens used in live search, for example we use abbreviate months as choices, but try to search "ber" :

pickerInput(
  inputId = "id",
  label = "Pick a month:",
  choices = month.abb,
  multiple = TRUE,
  options = pickerOptions(
    liveSearch = TRUE,
    liveSearchPlaceholder = "Type something!"
  ),
  choicesOpt = list(
    tokens = month.name
  )
)
